reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Strengthening national capacity for the protection, monitoring and sustainable management of Nepal's World Heritage properties

description.narrative: Within the framework of UNESCO Culture Conventions and in line with Government of Nepal's Periodic Plan/Strategy on culture, the Office will continue to focus on policy advocacy, capacity building programs and pilot projects (extra-budgetary fund), at the country's four World Heritage properties, involving stakeholders and local communities, both men and women, including youth. Support to restore and rebuild the cultural heritage damaged by the 2015 earthquake and coordination of various stakeholders in the Greater Lumbini Area will be continued. The Office strategy also includes protecting remote, significant heritage at risk along heritage corridor, sites on the Tentative List of WH as well as capacity building in better preparing for and responding to heritage in emergencies.
